property.name: galleryHeading
property.label: Gallery Title
property.description: Title shown at the top of the image gallery. Leave empty to not show a title.

property.name: getFilesFromParent
property.label: Show Parent Record Images
property.description: If the template is based on the Service Appointment object, this will show the images related to the parent record.

property.name: showLatestImageVersion
property.label: Show Latest Image Version
property.description: If a file has multiple versions (ContentVersion), only show the latest version.

property.name: showImgTitle
property.label: Show Image Title
property.description: Shows the title of the image positioned above the image.

property.name: showImgDesc
property.label: Show Image Description
property.description: Shows the description of the image positioned below the image.

property.name: thumbSize
property.label: Image Thumbnail Size
property.description: Select the thumbnail size of the image.

property.name: numOfColumns
property.label: Number Of Columns (1-12)
property.description: Number of columns used in the image gallery.

property.name: cellAlignment
property.label: Grid Cell Alignment
property.description: Alignment of the individual cells of the grid.
